item.name: redCover
item.description: The fury deck is composed by sharp and rusty cards. They have been around for many years now, yet they seek for glory in victories.

item.name: lightBlueCover
item.description: The sea deck comes from Naples, invented in the glorious sea age. Cards flow gently as they take away precious rewards from the table.

item.name: greenCover
item.description: None loses his faith with a hope deck in their hands. Known for extraordinary comebacks and unbelieved victories.

item.name: dragonCover
item.description: This deck has been created in honor of the Black Drake defeat in Umbaria.

item.name: phoenixCover
item.description: A legendary tier deck, designed to commemorate Flamia, the benevolent phoenix of Croxia.
